so the first night of hyperdrive was
pretty insane so we get there and they
tell us hey we're only filming at night
so we'd get there around 2:00 3:00 in

this point I haven't really driven this
Mercedes you know this past month has
been pretty crazy I wrecked my Viper I
had one of my rallies that we were doing
so I was not really prepared to be just
driving this car never driven so as I'm
kind of getting used to even how this
car handles they're like hey come on
over to this course we have these
practice courses set up which are pretty
much mock-ups
of what the obstacles are so instead of
putting us out there and had a big metal
container or a wall they actually had
these like cones set up and he said this
is a wall here these are an obstacle you
have to hit with the back of your car so
at the time I never once tried to hit
anything with my car are you trying to
avoid things so I'm going into cones and
I'm just spinning around and hitting
cone after cone after cone and you know
the stunt drivers there that were
teaching everyone you know how to run
the course is telling us like hey don't
hit those cones
you know just spin around them let your
back of your car nearly touch them and
come around and hit them one in the
center I can't do that but I'm trying so
I'm just spinning and just going in
circles and I'm literally smoking tires
so quickly that after one practice run
my rear tires were completely gone I get
a flat tire and I'm looking I'm like how
do I have a flat tire and I look and I
can see the metal chords of the tires
because as you're just spinning it and
the way the cambers on that car just
wasn't good so I go get new tires come
back and the guy is like hey he's like
try not to keep spinning like that
that's you want to slide not to spin in
circles you're just smoking your tires
that way I'm like I don't know how to do
that and he's trying to teach me and at
this point I'm like all right and I'm I
could feel something wrong with my car
cuz I'm holding that steering wheel all
the way over and I'm here in this
whining sound and
I've heard what power steering pumps
sound like him and how they make wines
and stuff so I'm like alright it's not
the end of the world but that's where I
lost all power steering in that car and
I'm like what am I going to do
so that's the moment where I had to kind
of put the car away and that's my first

film tomorrow and you are the first
player on the episode so this car needs
to be ready I'm like that's not gonna
happen and I had to explain to the

and that I couldn't do anything so
everybody else is practicing and these

they're pretty good already I mean
they're going around they spin so
everybody kind of headed to one minute
go out there you hit a couple cones to

up they they could actually turn their

they're telling me like it's easy you
know am i okay so I parked the car and
I'm just watching them practice now so
now I'm in this situation where I didn't
know how that car already drove because
I haven't had it that long and I it's
been being built for the past few weeks
now I'm only watching people drive their
cars so it's even making me more anxious
because I'm like these people know how
to drive this is what they do I just had
to sit there and wait and wait for
morning to go to Mercedes so hopefully
see if they can fix it and that's when I
found out you know that we brought it
over to Mercedes in Rochester and the
first thing they said to me is are you

I don't think anything big ever came out

to not warrant to your car and I'm like

paid whatever it cost to have it fixed
they wouldn't warranty it I Drive right

I do car shuts off power steering
everything just goes bad in it that
